blackrockshooter:DeadMasterEvent.NAME: The Dead Master
DESCRIPTIONS: You come across #g~The~ #g~Dead~ #g~Master~ sitting upon her throne. NL She looks at you intently and asks #g~Join~ #g~us~
You kneel and shout #b@"Yes,@ #b@My@ #b@Queen!"@ . She rewards your fealty and says... #g~Welcome~ .
You choose to defy her and #r@FIGHT@ . As you plunge your sword into her, she utters a final word... #g@Why?@
You offer her #yGold instead. She accepts your offer... #g~Hmmm~ .
